title: Barn
description: Houses 4 barn-dwelling animals.

title: Big Barn
description: Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.

title: Deluxe Barn
description: Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.

title: Coop
description: Houses 4 coop-dwelling animals.

title: Big Coop
description: Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.

title: Deluxe Coop
description: Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.

title: Fish Pond
description: Raise fish and harvest their produce. Fish multiply over time.

title: Mill
description: Allows you to create flour from wheat and sugar from beets.

title: Shed
description: An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.

title: Big Shed
description: Doubles the size of the shed. The interior can be decorated.

title: Silo
description: Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.

title: Slime Hutch
description: Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.
tags: Stone (500), Refined Quartz (10), Iridium Bar (1), Slimes, Slime

title: Stable
description: Allows you to adopt and ride a horse.

title: Well
description: Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.

title: Stone Cabin
description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Plank Cabin
description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Log Cabin
description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Shipping Bin
description: Throw items inside to sell them overnight.

title: Mayonnaise Machine
description: Turns eggs into mayonnaise.
tags: Wood (15), Stone (15), Earth Crystal (1), Copper Bar (1)

title: Bee House
description: Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).
tags: Wood (40), Coal (8), Iron Bar (1), Maple Syrup (1)

title: Preserves Jar
description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.

title: Cheese Press
description: Turns milk into cheese.

title: Loom
description: Turns raw wool into fine cloth.

title: Keg
description: Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.
tags: Wood (30), Copper Bar (1), Iron Bar (1), Oak Resin (1)

title: Oil Maker
description: Makes gourmet truffle oil.

title: Cask
description: Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.

title: Junimo Hut
description: Junimos will harvest crops around the hut for you.

title: Gold Clock
description: Fences and paths stop falling apart on the Farm.

title: Water Obelisk
description: Warps you to Beach.

title: Earth Obelisk
description: Warps you to the Mountain.

title: Desert Obelisk
description: Warps you to Desert.
